content: I started a conversation over in #frontend here, seeking feedback on a little popup for when you click on a group mention. I'm not sure where the conversation should be started, but in the interest of not diverging, I thought I'd post a link to it instead of forking it.

(Quick sidenote: I edited the topic to include #8300, so that we get a nice automatic link).

I think either place is fine, but usually we try to split #frontend as for implementation questions, and #design for visual questions (so that this is a fine place for non-programmers to contribute)
